column1: Baby Barnaby's////First the good: it was a good breakfast
column2: endless good coffee. Now the bad: provocatively atrocious service with a smile. We got there at 10 AM on a Sunday
column3: and were prepared for a long wait. It's a small place and apparently popular among the locals. So much so that two pairs behind us on the waiting list were called up before us
column4: adding another 10 minutes to an already long wait. We were quickly able to make our orders and were looking forward to our meals. For another 45 Minutes
column5: even as three couples who came in after us were served first. One couple that came in just after us were greeted by name
column7: paid and left a good five minutes before our order arrived. The message these travelers got?
